name: Foster Care Society

address: 29,Kesar Prakash, Janta Marg, Opp. JMB, Surajpole,
Gulab bagh road, Jindal Bags street, Surajpole,

briefDescription: We inspire society to reach optimum developmental standards, by ensuring the best interest of the children without any compromise for families and their communities. We work to support the implementation of successful nationwide foster care system in India. We believe that if we care for the foster parents well we empower them to care for the children's of India. Till date we have reached out to more than 400 lac people in the district to spread the awareness on foster care, attended more than 100 inquiries and done 8 successful placements,supporting 2 more districts in Rajasthan. We also work from the ground level with the help of family and community to improve the social development issues related to education,health,family preservation.
